Text:
Hey uploader.

I just came across this incredible VST, its the Sugar Bytes Guitar VSTI...Absolutely amazing realistic sound. 

I thought I would suggest/request it here  since this is the latest upload of a Suger bytes product.

Been having trouble finding it in Mac OSX format online, if anyone here can upload it for MAC that would be great! 

heres a video demo of it. demo just needs to be patched/cracked for mac.
